q: Jean Ping made the comments on the eve of the pan-African body's two-day summit which is expected to be dominated by the latest upheavals in the continent, including Tunisia and Ivory Coast. Jean Ping said the panel was set up to help implement the decision that has been taken recognising Alassane Ouattara 's victory and to`` enable Alassane Ouattara to exercise power.''`` Africans have decided that it shMohamed Ould Abdel Aziz be through political means, a peaceful and negotiated political solution,'' he added.
